title: Beginner Full Body Stretching Routine- Workout with Jordan
description:
Beginner Full Body Stretching Routine- Workout with Jordan

Jordan provides an easy-to-follow, head-to-toe, full-body stretching routine. This at-home routine is great for those who are sore and stiff following a workout or for the beginner that is looking to stretch out.

Youtube Channel: https://www.youtube.com/user/physicaltherapyvideo
Website: https://bobandbrad.com/
Bob and Brad Amazon Store: https://amzn.to/3jAM0JN

This video is part of a series called, Workout with Jordan. This video is a full body stretching routine. You may want a chair to hold onto for some of these stretches along with a yoga mat for comfort.

channelDescription:
Introducing the dynamic trio—Bob Schrupp, Brad Heineck, and the newest addition, Mike—the "Most Famous Physical Therapists on the Internet"! With a combined experience of over 60 years in the physical therapy field, these seasoned experts bring you the best advice, tips, and information on how to get fit, stay healthy, and live pain-free—from the comfort of your home.
While Bob may no longer be on the screen, he continues to share his expertise from behind the scenes, and now, Mike joins the on-screen action. Our videos cover a wide range of topics suitable for everyone, from age 0 to 101. Whether you're looking for self-treatment techniques or simply seeking health-related insights, Brad, Bob, and Mike have you covered.
With a twist of humor in each video, we aim to make your health journey enjoyable. Don't miss out on the fun—subscribe to our channel and join us in the pursuit of a healthy, fit, pain-free life!

As  Amazon Associates, we earn from qualifying purchase

comments: I yes did it  I'm 70 years old and after this I feel like 30 years old thank you God bless you  great job.🙏🙏🙏
Just what I needed this morning. Stretching is as important as cardio. I’m going to combine this workout with a daily 20 minute walk.
Hands down the best full body stretching I have seen on You Tube!  Excellent and correct instructions!  That was the best explanation and demonstration of a standing ITB stretch.  Great work Jordan!

Thank you for the video i have been looking for for years! One suggestion for future ones though; please wear contrasting colors on top and bottom as it is difficult to see some positions as the  black blends into the black on many bends and definition is completely lost for me. Thank you for posting this valuable piece!
What a GREAT and useful topic for EVERYONE! Thank you ❤🎀
